title: Two decades of clear-cutting threats in the Brazilian Amazonian protected areas around the Jirau, Santo Antônio, and Belo Monte large dams
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 359

Author(s): Silvia Sayuri Mandai, Evandro Albiach Branco, Evandro Mateus Moretto, Jocilene Dantas Barros, Guilherme Prado Alves, Renata Utsunomiya, Gustavo Felipe Balué Arcoverde, Cyro Assahira, Caroline C. Arantes, Guilherme de Sousa Lobo, Miquéias Freitas Calvi, Carolina Rodrigues da Costa Doria, Igor Cavalline Johansen, Gabriela Alves Carreiro, Paulo Henrique Bonavigo, Marcelo Lucian Ferronato, Vanessa Cristine e Souza Reis, Emílio Federico Moran
